quotes.quote: It's very annoying to look for someone to blame.
Live with pride. If your weakness overpowers you, warm your heart, grit your teeth, and move forward. Even if your cowardice slows you down, it won't stop the passage of time.
quotes.quoteCharacter: Rengoku Kyōjurō - Demon Slayer - Kimetsu no Yaiba

quotes.quote: What's the use if those who have the means and power don't fight?
If you win, you will live. If you lose, you will die. If you don't fight, you won't be able to win!
This world is ruthless and it is also very beautiful.
No matter how many people you may lose, you have no choice but to keep on living... No matter how devastating the blows may be.
quotes.quoteCharacter: Kamado Tanjirō - Demon Slayer - Kimetsu no Yaiba
